root.name: / (divide)

example.code: int g = 50 / 5; // Sets g 10 int h = g / 5; // Sets h 2

root.description: Divides the value of the second parameter by the value of the first parameter. The answer to the equation 20 / 4 is 5. The number 20 is the sum of 4 of the number 5. As an equation we see that 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 = 20.

parameter.label: value2
parameter.description: int or float, but not zero (it is not possible divide by zero)
